title: Microsoft Word 2010
headline: Learn how to make full use of the features and tools of Microsoft Word 2010 in this free online tutorial course.
description: This course guides you through the most useful features of Microsoft Word 2010 to let you unleash the full potential of this popular and powerful word processor. Word is used worldwide as a productivity tool for writing, word processing and document creation. Its features, tools, ease of use and overall power continues to increase to keep up with the evolving demands of the modern workplace. This course suits anyone who writes or edits text.

courseDescription:
This course begins by introducing you to Microsoft Word 2010’s layout and interface, including the ‘backstage’ view, customizable ribbon, text and image formatting options, live collaboration, cloud storage tools and much more. We examine the navigation panel used to manage headings, find objects and update page numbers and dates. We then show you how to customize your workspace and create complex documents with Word 2010.

Updating your word-processing skills with this course provides an excellent return for your time and energy as it can make you far more efficient in your daily use of Word. Those who have completed ‘ABC IT’, our comprehensive introductory computer course, will find this course to be the perfect next step. In addition to the complete basic functions of Word 2010, we explain how to use keyboard shortcuts with ‘access keys’ and key combos, which will speed up your use of Word.

This course suits all Microsoft Word users who wish to increase their efficiency and productivity to create better documents without increasing their workload. Take advantage of this online tutorial to boost your computer skills and get ahead of the pack.
